recommendations: Consider adding more appointment slots during March peak period
Implement reminder system to reduce 12.3% no-show rate
Redistribute patient load from March to January for better balance
Provider PROV007 has capacity for 15% more appointments
Return Data.report_summary: Q1 2024 utilization analysis shows strong overall performance at 78.5% utilization across 3 providers. March demonstrated peak demand with 94% utilization, while January showed opportunity for improvement at 65%. The 12.3% no-show rate presents the biggest optimization opportunity. Provider capacity varies significantly, with PROV007 having substantial availability for additional patient scheduling.
